Package org.apache.wiki.htmltowiki

Class Summary
ForgetNullValuesLinkedHashMap<K,V> A LinkedHashMap that does not put null values into the map.
HtmlStringToWikiTranslator Converting Html to Wiki Markup with NekoHtml for converting html to xhtml and Xhtml2WikiTranslator for converting xhtml to Wiki Markup.
PersistentMapDecorator Adds the load / save - functionality known from the Properties - class to any Map implementation.
PropertiesUtils some usefull methods for properties
WhitespaceTrimWriter Part of the XHtmlToWikiTranslator.
XHtmlElementToWikiTranslator Converting XHtml to Wiki Markup.
XHtmlToWikiConfig Defines a Wiki configuration to XHtmlToWikiTranslator, including things like URLs.
